name: @transcend-io/trackers-demo
description: Example of how basic cookie tracking works

scripts.start: concurrently -n server,tracker,server-2 'node src/server.js' 'node src/tracker.js' 'PORT=8084 node src/server.js'
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,tracker,server-2 'nodemon src/server.js' 'nodemon src/tracker.js' 'PORT=8084 nodemon src/server.js'

author: Transcend Inc.
